pages.text: Made with slightly complex magicks, these wands can perform quite useful magical tasks. I can fashion a wand by creating an arcane wand base, and then combining it with some materials and runic magic within the runic table.

The Arcane Wand Base is the primary component for all arcane wands. Unlike the mundane wand base, I can not simply use mundane woods. I must seek out wood that's slightly magical and craft it with a vis sliver in the runic table.
Imbued with the magic of air and aether, this wand can release a barrage of arrows in front of me.
